# nt25.py

Neo's Tools of Python in 2025

## TODO

- [x] fio
- [x] calc
- [x] draw
- [x] sqlite
- [x] et: EXIF tools with pillow
- [x] ef: EXIF tools with FFmpeg
- [x] mt: MapXYZ Transfer tool
- [x] ttp: TIFF to PNG, thread support
- [x] pgogs: Purge Gogs orphan files
- [ ] mysql
- [ ] redis

## scripts from init

```sh
# fio, calc, draw basic demo
uv run demo

# ef
uv run ef -v
```
